vclaim: On June 12, 2021, an unnamed person paid $28 million at a Blue Origin auction to join billionaire Jeff Bezos’ and his brother in a commercial trip to space.
title: Did an Unidentified Bidder Spend $28 Million in Auction to Join Jeff Bezos’ Flight into Space?
subtitle: The space-bound flight is expected to launch July 20, 2021.
author: Madison Dapcevich
